NOTE:  Location -- Skirball Cultural Center

2701 N. Sepulveda Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90049 Donation $10 -- Free Parking

subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h4|color:%23000000" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]Updating Our Macro Model and Risk Allocation Strategy[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

Come join us for the next Strategic Investing Group meeting. We will be updating you on the usual macro-context and review our macro model.

In addition we will be discussing risk.

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Do%20equities%20and%20bonds%20make%20sense%20if%20you%20adjust%20them%20for%20risk%3F%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22What%20happens%20when%20bonds%20and%20equities%20start%20having%20positive%20coorelations%3F%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" font_options="tag:h6|color:%233ba56d" icon_size="20" icon_color="#1e73be"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_single_image image="13843" img_size="full"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_single_image image="13842" img_size="full"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
Daniel Joye is a Franco-American born in Pasadena with extensive experience as a Contributor to Seeking Alpha on macro-economic subjects, and an advisor to TerraManta a Fintech start-up.
Post business school, Daniel worked in energy investing/trading for a decade at Morgan Stanley, Vitol and BP. He started his career in the French Navy, spent 4 years deployed throughout the globe as a weapons officer (canons & missiles). Daniel holds a Wharton MBA with a MS in Engineering.
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_button button_text="Download Presentation Slides" alignment="text-left" tooltip_alignment="dfd-button-tooltip-bottom" border="border_style:solid|border_radius:100" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Clicking This Button Will Open A New Tab" tutorials="" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" click_animation_color="#41d357" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Faaiila.org%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2020%2F03%2FRisk-Allocation-2020-02-21.pdf||target:%20_blank|" padding_left="30" padding_right="30" background="#42ce40" hover_background="#81d742" title_font_options="font_size:18|line_height:44|font_style_bold:1"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

Open to the public -- $10 donation -- Free Parking

More Info: Daniel Joye  daniel.joye@gmail.com

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
